tagline: Finds the recurring charges you forgot about and saves you real money
pros: Cost-per-use analysis that reveals true value
cons: Narrow focus — subscriptions only, not general budgeting
Can't access accounts or cancel on your behalf
Quarterly audit cadence requires ongoing commitment

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
